abstract: Last September, William P. Barr, the general counsel of Verizon Communications at the time, announced that he planned to retire at the end of the year. Mr. Barr had been with the company since it was formed in June 2000, and before that he worked at G.T.E., which merged with Bell Atlantic to become Verizon.
